title: Alternate File
description: A modified file, intended to serve as an alternative to an original file.
$comment: These properties must be kept in sync with file.schema.json

name.description: A name to display when referring to the file

type.description: The MIME type of the file

documentType.$comment: If a file contains multiple documents, this refers to the document starting on `startingPage`
documentType.description: The type of document contained in the file

startingPage.description: If the file is a PDF, the page it should be opened to by default

size.description: The size of the file, in bytes

modifications.description: Any modifications that have been made to the file since it was retrieved

accessibility.description: A list of the accessibility features that this file has or is lacking

notices.description: Any notices attached to this policy version file
